text: Adak jimeuprang meusiblah-siblah Kon jimeusapeue bak jiprang gata Jipeugot kuta beu kong sileupah Atawa tembok jidong di likot Dumnan teumakot jih han ban peugah Sabe keudroe-droe jih han meusaboh Meumusoh-musoh meupisah-pisah Sang-sang meusapeue tasangka jih nyan Atejih dum nyan lam muparakah Sabab awak nyan kureueng pikiran
